identity.id: Printing the Total Number of Times Elements of One Array Appear in Another Array__68bdb308f6cc3d7a9cc0967f-68bdb308f6cc3d7a9cc0967a-1
identity.title: Printing the Total Number of Times Elements of One Array Appear in Another Array

content.prompt: Construct a program that has a method that receives two arrays and prints the total number of times the elements in the 2nd array appear in the 1st array. For example, if the 1st array is {1, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, 5, 6} and the 2nd array is {3, 4, 5, 6, 7}, then the total number of times that the elements in the 2nd array appear in the 1st array is 6.\nNote that we need to count matches for all values in the 2nd array (including duplicate values, if any).
